title: Why Bother With Syntax?
abstract: This short note discusses the role of syntax vs. semantics and the interplay between logic, philosophy, and language in computer science and game theory.
histories: To appear in "Rohit Parikh on Logic, Language and Society" (C. Baskent, L. Moss, and R. Ramanjum, editors)
COMMENTS: To appear in "Rohit Parikh on Logic, Language and Society" (C. Baskent, L. Moss, and R. Ramanjum, editors)
